channel.title: RPN on Luma's Shoka
channel.description: Recent content in RPN on Luma's Shoka

item.title: Evaluate Reverse Polish Notation
item.description: Maintain a stack of result of the arithemetic expression. Push numbers into the stack. If it is an operator, pop two numbers out of the stack and evaluate it with the operator, and push the result back to the stack.
